feed.title: Proposed minor change to BIP 01 to use a PR for request assignment

entry.title: Proposed minor change to BIP 01 to use a PR for request assignment
entry.summary: The provided context is a PGP signed message with the signature of Douglas Roark, who is a Senior Developer at Armory Technologies, Inc. His email address is doug@bitcoinarmory.com and his PGP key ID is 92ADC0D7. The message includes an "ACK" which is typically used as an abbreviation for "acknowledgement." However, without any additional information, it is unclear what the acknowledgement pertains to. The rest of the message contains encrypted text, likely using the SHA512 hash function. The signature that follows indicates that the message has not been tampered with since it was signed by Douglas Roark. The signature includes a link to GPGTools, which is a software suite used for encryption and digital signatures.
